hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that ##the Temple of Time## has #2# major items.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #Zelda's Lullaby#.
